member.name: PROPERTYKEY
member.summary: Specifies the FMTID/PID identifier that programmatically identifies a property. Replaces SHCOLUMNID.

member.name: PROPERTYKEY.fmtid
member.summary: A unique GUID for the property.

summary.para: A property identifier (PID). This parameter is not used as in SHCOLUMNID. It is recommended that you set this value to PID_FIRST_USABLE. Any value greater than or equal to 2 is acceptable.
summary.div: Note Values of 0 and 1 are reserved and should not be used.
